:: Rodimus Prime ::

Rodimus and Nightlight share another kiss. Roddy walks into his room, 
with his arm around Nightlight's waist.

Roddy got some light Energon drinks, and placed them on a near by 
table. He then layed on the couch. He started to pull Nightlight down 
with him.
